item.title: Requirements
item.description: This page includes useful information on the supported Operating Systems as well as the hardware requirements that are needed to install and use Grafana. Supported operating systems The following operating systems are supported for Grafana installation:

item.title: Features
item.description: Alert List Panel The alert list panel allows you to display your dashboards alerts. The list can be configured to show current state or recent state changes. You can read more about alerts here.
